resources.string: Akrab is an application that offers convenience for peoples who are deaf and mute as well as for the public to learn sign language.

we present to you, our project, Akrab. Akrab is an android-based learning application that is intended for people who are deaf and mute, as a media for people with disabilities as well as for the general public who care about the importance of sign language to learn. This application offers an experience of how to communicate using sign language with machine learning-based interactive lessons whenever and wherever the user wants to learn. Users can practice the sign language theyâ€™ve learned through some exercises to measure their understanding.

Users are not allowed to take the contents of the Familiar application systematically to create or compile, either directly or indirectly, collections, compilations, databases or directories (either using automatic tools or manual processes) without our written permission. In addition, the User is not allowed to use the content or materials mentioned above for any purpose that is not stated in this Agreement
